name: Scarlet Meadow
description:
Save the streets of Curbana from crime with Scarlet Meadow and Cocoa Cavero in this platforming beat-em-up! Enjoy physically hand-drawn animation, with an angular mix of comic-book and Cuban inspired styles. Use Scarlet Meadow's lasso to wind up enemies, or use Cocoa Cavero's grenade launcher to knock 'em back. Master all 16 levels and try to get the fastest time on each!

Make your OWN 16 level campaigns with The Scarlet Editor, my custom-made level creation tool built just for this game, included with the game!

Watch the trailer for more information and to see the game in action!
